description:
Charles Goodshow is the president of the Pok√©mon League and governs the tournaments held accross different tournaments including Kanto, Johto and Heonn.
He is also responsible for the Moltres flame which he uses to keep the torches held by the runners lit.
When he saw Ash Ketchum`s spirit and attitude he allowed Ash, Misty and Brock be a runner and hold the events torch lit by the Moltress flame
name: Tamaranze-kaichou
